birth.longtext: I was born in Paris (11th arondissement) to Daniel and Rose-Marie Rigot, with 2 bigger sisters Mélina and Adeline.

2012-06-09.longtext: I married Vanessa Paquerot on 6/9, in Montgobert, Picardie, because it was the cheapest genuine little castle we could rent that you could get to from Paris by train.
